title: BBM Baby
lyrics:
“BBM Baby” is an unreleased song by Lana Del Rey. Produced in 2011 by Penguin Prison. The song was teased around tumblr on July 2016, and finally leaked on August 15th, 2016.
[Verse 1]
I be BBM'in' you
Telling you
All the things I'm gonna do to you
When you get home baby
Makin' love then yelling, ooh
Nothin' I would rather do
Than flirt and talkin dirty, you
Love me, hate me
[Pre-Chorus]
It’s like it’s your job to work me up
Treatin' me nice, and then treatin' me rough
And I don’t know why, but I can’t get enough
I like it, I like it
And I know that I’m making you nuts
Middle of the night and when I’m waking up
I don’t know why, but you can’t get enough
You like it, you like it
[Chorus]
Be my BBM baby
Middle of the night, waking up to write
Be my BBM baby
I don’t wanna fight, you’re the one I like
Yeah, yeah, always on my mind
Yeah, yeah, when will you be mine

[Verse 2]
I be BBM'in' you
Lettin' you love me in your letters, ooh
The way that you write is crazy
Your typing is poetical
Red roses in your message, oh
I think I met my match in you
Text me, chase me
[Pre-Chorus - Variation]
It’s like it’s your job to work me up
Treatin' me nice, and then treatin' me rough
And I don’t know why, but I can’t get enough
I like it, I like it
He signs XO, hugs, hey
I know it’s true love cause my heart goes yay
[Chorus]
Be my BBM baby
Middle of the night, waking up to write
Be my BBM baby
I don’t wanna fight, you’re the one I like
Yeah, yeah, you’re always on my mind
Yeah, yeah, when will you be mine
[Bridge]
He signs XO, hugs, hey
I know it’s true love cause my heart goes yay
He signs XX, kiss, babe
I don’t wanna fight
Boy you got me crazed
In the middle of the night
He writes that he’s outside
I left my window open baby
You can come inside
Call me when you get here
I’ll be ready boy
Cause I heart you, you’re the one that I adore

[Chorus - Variation]
So won’t you be my BBM baby
Middle of the night, wakin up to write
(So won’t you be) be my BBM baby
I don’t wanna fight, you’re the one I like
Be my BBM baby
Middle of the night, wakin' up to write
(Oh, won’t you be) Be my BBM baby
I don’t wanna fight, you’re the one I like
Yeah, yeah, you’re always on my mind
Yeah, yeah, when will you be mine
Yeah, yeah, you’re always on my mind
Yeah, yeah, when will you be mine
